forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. High near 60F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
